Title: A Clockwork Orange
Actors: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke
Plot: In future Britain, Alex DeLarge, a charismatic and psychopath delinquent, who likes to practice crimes and ultra-violence with his gang, is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 19 nominations.
